name: Hecatomb
description:
You have been summoned to reconsecrate the Sacrificial Temple. The people gathered here are honored to die in the service of the gods, take as many of them as you can. and be quick about it, as soon as their blood ceases to flow you will be hurled back into the underworld.

Controls: Left click your next victim, and be quick about it, faster attacks let you jump further and give more points.

Features:

  • Action Packed Action!
  • Screams!
  • C-c-c-combos!

Made by @FieroNZ in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 33
